constrain.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 subroutine constrain
00002     use physvars
00003     use treevars
00004     use utils
00005 
00006     implicit none
00007 
00008     real*8, dimension(1:3)              :: r_new, r_old, r_test, v
00009     real*8                              :: c_status             ! particle in or out?
00010     integer                             :: p, face_nr
00011 
00012     ! bisections
00013     real*8, dimension(1:3)              :: r_d, temp            ! crossing point of particle
00014     real*8                              :: p_new, p_old, diff
00015 
00016     ! reflection plane
00017     real*8, dimension(1:3)              :: n
00018 
00019     ! new direction of v
00020     real*8, dimension(1:3)                :: c
00021 
00022     ! file id
00023     integer                             :: c_file = 76, nr_out
00024     logical :: constrain_debug=.false.
00025 
00026     if (constrain_debug) write(*, *) 'in constrain'
00027 
00028     ! walk through all particles
00029     nr_out = 0
00030     do p = 1, npp
00031         r_new = (/x(p), y(p), z(p)/)
00032         v = (/ux(p), uy(p), uz(p)/)
00033 
00034         do face_nr = 1, number_faces ! walk through all faces
00035             call face(r_new, c_status, face_nr, & 
00036               target_geometry, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre )
00037 
00038             if (c_status .ge. 0.) then
00039                 nr_out = nr_out + 1
00040 
00041                 ! get a good r_old
00042                 r_test = r_new - dt * v
00043                 call face(r_test, c_status, face_nr, & 
00044                   target_geometry, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre )
00045                 if (c_status .gt. 0.) then
00046                     call cutvector(r_test, face_nr, n, r_old, &
00047                         target_geometry, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre )
00048                    temp = r_new - r_old
00049                     v = sqrt(dot_product(v, v)) * temp / sqrt(dot_product(temp, temp))
00050                 else
00051                     r_old = r_test
00052                 end if
00053         
00054                 ! bisection for the particle
00055                 p_new = 1.
00056                 p_old = 0.
00057                 r_test = r_old + p_new * (r_new - r_old)
00058                 call face(r_test, c_status, face_nr, &
00059                   target_geometry, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre )
00060                 do while (abs(c_status) .gt. constrain_proof)
00061                     diff = abs(p_new - p_old) / 2.
00062                     p_old = p_new
00063                     if (c_status .gt. 0.) then
00064                         p_new = p_new - diff
00065                     else
00066                         p_new = p_new + diff
00067                     end if
00068                     r_test = r_old + p_new * (r_new - r_old)
00069                     call face(r_test, c_status, face_nr, &
00070                        target_geometry, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre )
00071                 end do
00072 !                if (constrain_debug) write(*, *) 'Bisection for particle done.'
00073                 call cutvector(r_test, face_nr, n, r_d, & 
00074                   target_geometry, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre )
00075                 ! Reflect
00076                 v = v - 2. * dot_product(v, n) * n
00077                 if (constrain_debug) write(*, *) 'Reflecting .. new v: v     = ', v(1:3)
00078                 c = v / sqrt(dot_product(v, v))
00079                 r_new = r_d + sqrt(dot_product(r_d - r_new, r_d - r_new)) * c
00080                 x(p) = r_new(1)
00081                 y(p) = r_new(2)
00082                 z(p) = r_new(3)
00083                 ux(p) = v(1)
00084                 uy(p) = v(2)
00085                 uz(p) = v(3)
00086             end if
00087         end do
00088     end do
00089  if (constrain_debug)    write(*, *) 'Number of reflections: ', nr_out
00090  
00091 end subroutine constrain
